overview: Whether they're in the classroom or pouring over the books at home, these High School Twinks always take time out to Love My Buddy but when we say 'love' we really mean 'get naked and blatantly dirty' with each other. At this school, if you give your teacher an apple, he'll bend you over his desk and give you a lot more than just good grades and having a study buddy never works out with these randy boys. As soon as they get home, all thought of revision goes out the window and cocks and cum jump to the top of the curriculum. Bet you wish your high school was as playful as this.
title: Love My Buddy
